name: nuclide-js-imports-client
description: Provides support for JS auto-imports in nuclide
author: NEEDS OWNER

diagnosticsWhitelist.title: Directories for which the JS-Autoimports server should provide diagnostics
diagnosticsWhitelist.description: If the working directory matches any of these regexes, then diagnostics will be provided. If the array is empty, diagnostics will be provided for all directories.

requiresWhitelist.title: Directories for which the JS-Autoimports server should use requires, not imports
requiresWhitelist.description: If the working directory matches any of these regexes, then suggestions will use requires rather than imports.

componentModulePathFilter.title: Component Module Path Filter
componentModulePathFilter.description: Only React components with paths containing this substring will be indexed by Component Tools.
